message.content: On Monday, $w$ widgets per hour worked for $t$ hours gives $w \cdot t = 2t \cdot t = 2t^2$ widgets produced. On Tuesday, $w+4$ widgets per hour worked for $t-2$ hours gives $(w+4) \cdot (t-2) = (2t+4) \cdot (t-2) = 2t^2-4$ widgets produced. The difference between Monday's and Tuesday's production is thus $2t^2 - (2t^2-4) = \boxed{4}$ widgets.
